Task ID:
\h(«Aika»)Wha, what is this thing!?
Is it an insect or something?\e

\h(«Vyse»)Wow… There are things like this flying around?
Now this is why I love sailing… You never know
what you'll run into…\c

\h(«Aika»)It's too thin!
We can't hit it from the side…\e

\h(«What will you do?»)“Swing around to the front!”
“Get behind it!”\c

\h(«Vyse»)Okay, we're right in front of it!
We should be able to hit it now!\e

\h(«Aika»)The front? Um… Are you sure that thing
has a front and a back? They both look
the same to me.\e

\h(«Vyse»)Wh, what does it matter?!
Just fire at it!!\c

\h(«Vyse»)Okay, we got behind it!
This should give us an advantage!\e

\h(«Aika»)Behind it? Um… Are you sure that thing
has a front and a back? They both look
the same to me.\e

\h(«Vyse»)J, just leave me alone!!
I know what I'm doing! If I say it's the back,
it's the back, okay? Just fire at it!!\c

\h(«Aika»)Alright!
It's starting to run away!\e

\h(«Vyse»)See? I told you
this was the front!
Alright, let's go after it!\c

\h(«Aika»)Um… sure. Whatever, Vyse.
Well, beginning pursuit!\c

\h(«Aika»)Alright!
It's starting to run away!\e

\h(«Vyse»)See, I told you
this was the back!
Alright, let's go after it!\c

\h(«Aika»)Um… sure. Whatever, Vyse.
Well, beginning pursuit!\c

\h(«Aika»)Uh oh, it looks like it's coming closer!
I think it looks mad… sorta.\e

\h(«Vyse»)That's funny…
I could have sworn
we were in front of it…\e

\h(«Aika»)Will you just get over it already?
Here it comes! Brace yourselves!\c
